class="product-grid__seo-info-wrapper"><div class="product-grid-seo-info product-grid__seo-info"><h1 class="product-grid-seo-info__header">Shirts For Men</h1><div class="expandable-text product-grid-seo-info__expandable-text"><div class="expandable-text__content"><div class="expandable-text__inner-content"><div class="product-grid-seo-info__description">A basic item in any mans wardrobe, a mans shirt is at the peak of male fashion, offering day-to-evening styles that cover all your needs. If dressed for the office or a formal event, or for a relaxed evening out, our selection of mens shirts includes <a href="man-shirts-formal-l751.html">formal designs</a> that are pivotal to smart and tailored looks, whilst more <a href="man-shirts-oversize-l5523.html">relaxed styles</a> offer easy-going cuts and playful patterns to unleash your creative side. Formal shirts come in an array of classic designs with plain, <a href="man-shirts-striped-l766.html">striped shirts</a>, or textured patterns, while <a href="man-shirts-casual-l743.html">casual shirts</a> offer a versatile choice between <a href="man-shirts-denim-l748.html">denim shirts,</a> <a href="man-shirts-check-l745.html">check shirts</a>, and even <a href="man-shirts-floral-l1657.html">floral shirts</a>. role="alert"><img src="https://static.zara.net/stdstatic/5.40.1/images/loader.gif" alt="" height="11" width="16"></div></section></div><div class="product-grid-seo-info products-category-view__seo-info"><h1 class="product-grid-seo-info__header">Zara's shirts for sophisticated men's looks for every occasion</h1><div class="expandable-text product-grid-seo-info__expandable-text"><div class="expandable-text__content" style=""><div class="expandable-text__inner-content"><div class="product-grid-seo-info__description">Mens shirts stand among the basic pieces that are a must-have in any mans wardrobe. Incredibly versatile, the male shirt has the ability to determine an entire outfit, as it works either for a formal or a casual style.

Mens shirts have long gone past formal-only use; todays modern man is able to express himself with an array of bold colours and prints and even powerful inscriptions that form a true statement.
Our <a href="man-shirts-formal-l751.html">formal shirts</a> are a perfect choice for elegant occasions or work, varied in fits and silhouettes to suit any personal preference. On the top of the scale are the classic styles that form a timeless basic to go with any attire: plain weave, Poplin, Oxford, stripes or checks. These all-year-round winners are a safe bet and can be combined with both smart suits or semi-smart trousers and jackets. <a href="man-shirts-striped-l766.html">Stripe shirts</a> are particularly good as their vertical pattern elongates the body and creates a distinctive look.

On the other hand, <a href="man-shirts-casual-l743.html">casual shirts</a> offer endless variations that cater for any personal taste, whether subtle or more daring. Our selection includes <a href="man-shirts-denim-l748.html">denim shirts</a>, <a href="man-shirts-linen-l754.html">linen shirts</a>, <a href="man-shirts-check-l745.html">check shirts</a>, and even <a href="man-shirts-floral-l1657.html">floral shirts.</a>

The Denim shirt offers a sturdy yet sophisticated feel with a fabric that blends in with anything, while linen is a breathable and lighter material that soothes the skin and allows breathability. Cotton is a true classic, enabling its natural fibres to attune to and align with the bodys temperature. Within the casual styles, <a href="man-shirts-printed-l759.html">bold prints</a> and patterns such as florals, abstracts, and tie-dye can be found suitable for a true man of fashion who is not afraid of showing off his style.

Zaras mens shirt collections come in a variety of cuts and fits, from slim to regular and on to relaxed and oversized shapes with long or short sleeves. If comfort is in mind, our shirts with added stretch are the way to go, as they move with your body and create a feeling of freedom whilst maintaining sartorial flair. Subtle detailing such as contrast colours and trims appears in different styles, allowing those who appreciate the smaller nuances to wear such pieces knowing much thought had been given to their choice.
From Traditional looks to trendy statements, Zaras mens shirt collection has everything at hand for an impeccable impression that will last over time.</div></div></div><button class="expandable-text__view-more product-grid-seo-info__view-more" data-qa-action="toggle-expandable-text"><span>View more</span></button></div></div><section class="products-category-seo-cloud"><h2 <script>
   function clearLocalStorageItemsWithPrefix(prefix) {
        if (!window?.localStorage) {
            return;
        }
    
        const deletionFlagKey = 'ZARCHWEB-2132';
        if (localStorage.getItem(deletionFlagKey)) {
            return;
        }
    
        const keysToRemove = Object.keys(localStorage).filter(key => key.startsWith(prefix));
    
        keysToRemove.forEach(key => localStorage.removeItem(key));
    
        localStorage.setItem(deletionFlagKey, 'true');
    }

    clearLocalStorageItemsWithPrefix('snowplowOutQueue_itx-observability-js');
</script>

class="ot-desc-cntr" id="ot-tab-desc" tabindex="0" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="ot-pvcy-hdr"><h4 id="ot-pvcy-hdr">Your Privacy</h4><p id="ot-pc-desc" class="ot-grp-desc">Cookies and other similar technologies are an essential part of how our Platform works. The main goal of cookies is to make your browsing experience easier and more efficient and to improve our services and the Platform itself. Likewise, we use cookies to show you targeted advertising when you visit third-party websites and apps.
Here, you will find all the information on the cookies we use. Furthermore, you will be able to activate and/or deactivate them according to your preferences, except for any cookies that are strictly necessary for the functioning of the Platform.
Keep in mind that blocking certain cookies may affect your experience on the Platform, as well as its functioning.
For more information, please consult our
            <br><a href="https://static.zara.net/static/pdfs/ZARA/cookies-policy/cookies-policy-en_US-20201028.pdf" class="privacy-notice-link" rel="noopener" target="_blank" aria-label="More information about your privacy, opens in a new tab">Cookie Policy</a></p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0001"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Strictly necessary cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"><div class="ot-always-active">Always Active</div></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies are necessary for the correct functioning of the Platform, and they cannot be deactivated on our systems. Generally speaking, they are configured to respond to actions made by you when requesting services, such as adjusting your privacy preferences, logging in to your account or filling out forms. You can configure your browser to block these cookies or alert you when they are present; however, some parts of the platform will not work without them.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="C0001">Cookies Details</button></div></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0002"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Analysis cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0002" id="ot-group-id-C0002" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0002" checked="" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0002"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0002"><span class="ot-switch-nob" aria-checked="true" role="switch" aria-label="Analysis cookies"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Analysis cookies</span></label> <span class="ot-label-status">Active</span></div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies allow us to analyze the number of visits and sources of traffic in order to measure and improve the performance of our Platform. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular, and how many people visit the website. If you do not allow these cookies, we will not know when you visited our Platform.
To turn these cookies on or off toggle the button above. "Active" means these cookies can be used. "Inactive" means these cookies cannot be used.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="C0002">Cookies Details</button></div></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0003"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Functionality or customisation cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0003" id="ot-group-id-C0003" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0003" checked="" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0003"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0003"><span class="ot-switch-nob" aria-checked="true" role="switch" aria-label="Functionality or customisation cookies"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Functionality or customisation cookies</span></label> <span class="ot-label-status">Active</span></div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies enhance the functionality and personalisation of the Platform. function create_dataLayer(){var d=getValue("template");switch(d){case "PRODUCT_LIST":case "CATEGORY_VIEW":case "CATEGORY":dataLayer.push({category:getValue("category"),categoryId:getValue("categoryId"),catIdentifier:getValue("catIdentifier"),currency:getValue("currency"),template:d,hostname:getValue("hostname"),country:getValue("country"),language:getValue("language"),event:"dataLayer_ready",userData:{email:getValue("userEmail")}});break;case "PRODUCT_DETAILS":case "E-GIFTCARD":case "GIFTCARD":dataLayer.push({products:null});
dataLayer.push({products:getValue("singleProduct"),currency:getValue("currency"),template:d,hostname:getValue("hostname"),country:getValue("country"),language:getValue("language"),event:"dataLayer_ready",userData:{email:getValue("userEmail")}});break;case "PRODUCT_BUNDLE_DETAILS":dataLayer.push({products:null});dataLayer.push({products:getValue("bundleProducts"),currency:getValue("currency"),template:d,hostname:getValue("hostname"),country:getValue("country"),language:getValue("language"),event:"dataLayer_ready",
userData:{email:getValue("userEmail")}});break;case "SHOPPING_CART":dataLayer.push({cartProducts:getValue("cartProducts"),currency:getValue("currency"),transactionTotal:getValue("transactionTotal"),transactionId:getValue("transactionId"),template:d,hostname:getValue("hostname"),country:getValue("country"),language:getValue("language"),event:"dataLayer_ready",userData:{email:getValue("userEmail")}});break;case "PURCHASE_ORDER_END":case "ORDER_CONFIRMED":dataLayer.push({currency:getValue("currency"),
transactionTotal:getValue("transactionTotal"),transactionId:getValue("transactionId"),quantity:getValue("quantity"),purchasedProducts:getValue("purchasedProducts"),transactionTax:getValue("transactionTax"),transactionShipping:getValue("transactionShipping"),transactionDiscount:getValue("transactionDiscount"),template:d,hostname:getValue("hostname"),country:getValue("country"),language:getValue("language"),event:"dataLayer_ready",userData:{email:getValue("userEmail")}});break;case "HOME":case "PRODUCT_SEARCH_START":case "SEARCH_RESULT":case "CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_METHOD":case "USER_LOGON":case "USER_REGISTRATION":case "CHECKOUT_PERSONAL_DETAILS_GUEST":case "CHECKOUT_SHIPPING_METHOD":case "CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_DATA":case "CHECKOUT_ORDER_REVIEW":case "CHECKOUT_SUMMARY":case "PERSONAL_LIST":dataLayer.push({template:d,
hostname:getValue("hostname"),currency:getValue("currency"),country:getValue("country"),language:getValue("language"),event:"dataLayer_ready",userData:{email:getValue("userEmail")}});break;default:google_tag_manager["rm"]["13062813"](38).includes("/share/wishlist")&&dataLayer.push({template:"SHARED_WISHLIST",hostname:getValue("hostname"),currency:getValue("currency"),country:getValue("country"),language:getValue("language"),event:"dataLayer_ready",userData:{email:getValue("userEmail")}})}}create_dataLayer();</script>

f)}};window.analytics.uaCommon.sendExperimentInfo=function(a){try{if(a&&a.experimentId&&a.variantName){var b={};b.cd171=a.experimentId+(a.experimentName?"#"+a.experimentName:"")+"::"+a.variantName;window.analytics.uaCommon.sendEvent(a.appName||"Optimizely",a.experimentId+(a.experimentName?"#"+a.experimentName:""),a.variantName,b)}}catch(d){google_tag_manager["rm"]["33984694"](58)&&console.log("Error uaCommon.sendExperimentInfo: "+d)}};
window.analytics.uaCommon.sendPageView=function(a,b,d,e){try{var h={path:a,title:b};void 0!==d&&Object.keys(d).forEach(function(f){h[f]=d[f]});void 0!==e&&Object.keys(e).forEach(function(f){h[f]=e[f]});analyticsDataLayer.push({event:"ua_page_view",ua_page:h,_clear:!0})}catch(f){google_tag_manager["rm"]["33984694"](59)&&console.log("Error uaCommon.sendPageView: "+f)}};window.analytics.uaCommon.resendPageView=function(a){analyticsDataLayer.push({event:"ua_page_view",ua_page:a})};
window.analytics.uaCommon.sendPopupView=function(a,b,d){try{var e={path:a,title:b};void 0!==d&&Object.keys(d).forEach(function(h){e[h]=d[h]});analyticsDataLayer.push({event:"ua_popup_view",ua_popup:e,_clear:!0})}catch(h){google_tag_manager["rm"]["33984694"](60)&&console.log("Error uaCommon.sendPopupView: "+h)}};
window.analytics.uaCommon.closePopup=function(a){try{analyticsDataLayer.push({ua_popup:void 0}),a&&analyticsDataLayer.push({event:"ua_page_view"})}catch(b){google_tag_manager["rm"]["33984694"](61)&&console.log("Error uaCommon.closePopup: "+b)}};
window.analytics.uaCommon.sendEvent=function(a,b,d,e,h){try{var f={category:a,action:b,label:d};void 0!==e&&Object.keys(e).forEach(function(c){f[c]=e[c]});void 0!==h&&Object.keys(h).forEach(function(c){f[c]=h[c]});analyticsDataLayer.push({event:"ua_event",ua_event:f,_clear:!0})}catch(c){google_tag_manager["rm"]["33984694"](62)&&console.log("Error uaCommon.sendEvent: "+c)}};
